references.reason: This paper introduces classifier-free guidance, a crucial technique used in the OneActor model for controlling the generation process of diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a powerful model that bridges the gap between image and text understanding, which is fundamentally important to the OneActor model.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, which are the backbone of OneActor and significantly improve efficiency and image quality.

references.paper_title: The chosen one: Consistent characters in text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the problem of consistent subject generation in text-to-image diffusion models, which is the primary focus of OneActor.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper introduces Textual Inversion, a key technique for subject-specific training in diffusion models, which OneActor builds upon.
